frame.name: Use_firearm
frame.definition: <def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> causes a <fen>Firearm</fen> to discharge, usually directing the projectile from the barrel of the <fen>Firearm</fen> (the <fen>Source</fen>), along a <fen>Path</fen>, and to a <fen>Goal</fen>. <ex><fex name="Agent">The Germans</fex> wouldn't stop <t>shooting</t> <fex name="Firearm">cannons</fex> <fex name="Goal">at them</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Agent">Oswald</fex> <t>fired</t> <fex name="Iteration">twice</fex> <fex name="Path">through the window</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Agent
FE.definition: <def-root>The self-directed entity that uses and activates the <fen>Firearm</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Firearm
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Firearm</fen> that an <fen>Agent</fen> activates so that it rapidly propels a projectile.</def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the means by which an <fen>Agent</fen> uses the <fen>Firearm</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the manner in which an <fen>Agent</fen> uses the <fen>Firearm</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the place where the Agent intentionally affects the Patient. </def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the purpose for which an <fen>Agent</fen> uses the firearm. <ex><t>Firing</t> cannons <fex name="Purp">to have a good time</fex> is not my idea of prudence!</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Agent</fen> fires the <fen>Firearm</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Goal
FE.definition: <def-root>Goal is the location the Theme ends up in, or is intended to end up in. <ex>Who <t>fired</t> a pistol <fex name="Goal">at my client</fex>?</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Path
FE.definition: <def-root>This is the path along which the projectiles travel.</def-root>

FE.name: Source
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Source</fen> is the location of the <fen>Firearm</fen> from which projectiles originate.</def-root>

FE.name: Area
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Area</fen> is the setting in which the projectile's movement takes place. <ex>Sometimes they got together and <t>fired</t> off M-16 <fex name="Area">in the park</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Iteration
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the number of times a firearm is used.</def-root>

FE.name: Depictive
FE.definition: <def-root>Depicitive phrase describing the state of a participant in the action.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: fire.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: discharge (a gun or other weapon).
